author: SeverinDiederichs
body:
This PR updates AdePT to v0.1.8, which includes an important fix for the B field and the possibility to add experiment-specific SteppingActions. Thus, a new flag must be passed to use the CMS GPU SteppingAction.

This will require a new IB, as I cannot use a local AdePT build within CMS that has interface changes.
title: Update AdePT to v0.1.8
